text.div:
This value set to be used to identify the type of agent that is signing. This is related but different to the signature type. This value set includes sample Contract Signer Type codes.
Contract Signer Type Codes
This value set includes sample Contract Signer Type codes.
Copyright Statement: This is an example set based on ASTM Standard, E1762-95 (2013) HL7 RoleClass OID 2.16.840.1.113883.5.110, HL7 Role Code 2.16.840.1.113883.5.111, HL7 ParticipationType OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90, HL7 ParticipationFunction codes at OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.88, and HL7 Security and Privacy Domain Analysis Model roles classes.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:
Include all codes defined in http://www.hl7.org/fhir/contractsignertypecodes

description.value: This value set includes sample Contract Signer Type codes.

copyright.value: This is an example set based on ASTM Standard, E1762-95 (2013) HL7 RoleClass OID 2.16.840.1.113883.5.110, HL7 Role Code 2.16.840.1.113883.5.111, HL7 ParticipationType OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90, HL7 ParticipationFunction codes at OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.88, and HL7 Security and Privacy Domain Analysis Model roles classes.
